content:
_ _
**Welcome to the *Death Jesters & Zeroes to Heroes* community!**
_  _

embeds.title: IMPORTANT!!
embeds.description:
*We want you to get the best value you can out of our community, and doing so requires you to review some additional steps:*

_  _

fields.name: Follow channels and categories of interest
fields.value: - Go check out the <id:browse> menu and select any of your interests. Make sure to follow the categories to see any new channels that are added in the future!

fields.name: Choose pingable roles
fields.value: - Visit the <#676924129076576263> channel and choose any roles for which you'd like to receive notifications.

fields.name: Getting In Game Invites
fields.value: - Use the [ticketing system](https://discord.com/channels/231141125359009793/523555986343198728/1182131054769881158) for any in game invites you might need. There is also a ticket for having your Discord nickname changed to match your in game name. It's important that these match so we can recognize who you are!

fields.name: About Us & Rules
fields.value: - You can read the [message](https://discord.com/channels/231141125359009793/523555986343198728/1132193921238323241) in our <#523555986343198728> channel if you haven't already to get a brief introduction to the community, what we are about, and our very simple set of rules to maintain a pleasant and harmonious atmosphere both in Discord and in game.

fields.name: Organized Raid Teams
fields.value: - Check out the <#725788225230340097> channel and feel free to inquire to any of those contacts about joining their teams, or hit the [LFRT ticket](https://discord.com/channels/231141125359009793/725788225230340097/1132194877577363527) to get a little extra help from our liaison team.

embeds.title: Questions?
embeds.description:
If you have any questions feel free to ask in the server, or here in this private thread where one of our friendly <@&1172578109032255558> will be happy to assist you!

You can leave this thread at any time, or it will auto-archive in three days.

*If you have a moment, please help us better this community by responding to this [short survey](<https://cryptpad.zthcommunity.com/form/#/2/form/view/os3k4bqFjVoiVfNlO3KIdwoUPA1UVpxQBlgWMwvd+Co/embed/>) so we can learn how to better ourselves.*
